channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spotify tests a video feature for audiobooks as it ramps up video expansion

item.title: WordPress.com owner Automattic snaps up grammar checker Harper
item.description: WordPress.com owner Automattic has added another company to its portfolio of online content creation tools and services with its acquisition of Gramma...

item.title: Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro With DockKit Review: Hands-Free Fun
item.description: This MagSafe wireless charging stand rotates to track your movements and is great for shooting video and FaceTime.

item.title: FCC chair Jessica Rosenworcel agrees to step down

item.title: Border Militias Prepare to Assist With Donald Trump’s Mass Deportation Plans
item.description: Militias that patrol the US border with Mexico are thrilled that Donald Trump has been elected—and plan to be a “valuable resource” to the incoming ad...

item.title: Daniel Craig’s Secret Omega Seamaster Diver Has Dropped
item.description: After “leaking” the new model on the wrist of the former James Bond actor at Paris 2024, the watch brand finally released this much-anticipated diver.

item.title: WalkingPad C2 Mini Foldable Treadmill Review: Stable Underfoot
item.description: You can reach your step goals—even when working from home—when you have a walking pad.

item.title: Threads adjusts its algorithm to show you more content from accounts you follow
item.description: After several complaints about its algorithm, Threads is finally making changes to surface more content from people you follow in the algorithmic feed...

item.title: 9 Best Cooling Mattresses (2024): Hybrid, Soft, Foam
item.description: Nothing ruins a great night of sleep faster than getting too hot. We slept on multiple cooling mattresses to find which ones drew the heat away best.

item.title: Reddit is down again
